name: CVE-2021-22898
description: curl 7.7 through 7.76.1 suffers from an information disclosure when the `-t` command line option, known as `CURLOPT_TELNETOPTIONS` in libcurl, is used to send variable=content pairs to TELNET servers. Due to a flaw in the option parser for sending NEW_ENV variables, libcurl could be made to pass on uninitialized data from a stack based buffer to the server, resulting in potentially revealing sensitive internal information to the server using a clear-text network protocol.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:haxx:curl:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:debian:debian_linux:9.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:33:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:34:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:mysql_server:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:mysql_server:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:essbase:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:essbase:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:communications_cloud_native_core_network_slice_selection_function:1.8.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:communications_cloud_native_core_network_repository_function:1.15.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:communications_cloud_native_core_network_function_cloud_native_environment:1.10.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:communications_cloud_native_core_service_communication_proxy:1.15.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:communications_cloud_native_core_network_repository_function:1.15.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:communications_cloud_native_core_binding_support_function:1.11.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:siemens:sinec_infrastructure_network_services:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
